Package audio

Interface PSG

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachedPSG
    public interface PSG
extends java.lang.Runnable
    PSG = Programmable sound generator

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static PSG.Waveform[] PERCUSSION_WAVEFORMS
      Pre-defined percussion waveforms used when the PSG is in percussion mode.
      static double TWO_PI
      Constant used in sampling waveforms.

      • setPercussion

        PSG setPercussion​(boolean b)
        Toggle percussion mode.
        Parameters:
        b - Percussion mode (true = yes, false = no)
        Returns:
        The PSG instance itself.

      • setLoudness

        PSG setLoudness​(double d)
        Set the master volume.
        Parameters:
        d - The master volume from 0 to 1.
        Returns:
        The PSG instance itself.

      • getLoudness

        double getLoudness()
        Get the master volume.
        Returns:
        The master volume from 0 to 1.

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Get the state of the PSG.
        Returns:
        If the PSG is still running, return true, false otherwise.

      • isPercussion

        boolean isPercussion()
        Determine if the PSG is in percussion mode.
        Returns:
        If the PSG is in percussion mode, return true, false otherwise.

      • setPlaybackSpeed

        Set the playback speed of the PSG.
        Parameters:
        d - The new playback speed.
        Returns:
        The PSG instance itself.
